. To estimate the contribution of HA-head-directed antibodies to protection from influenza infection in children and adults, Eq. 3 was incorporated into a partially observed Markov model that simulates individuals’ latent (unobserved) HI titers and susceptibility to infection over time while simultaneously accounting for measurement error (Fig. 1b; “Methods” section). The model assumes that infection can change the antibody titer, which allows infection events and thereby latent susceptibil
i ty ( q
i, s ( t)) to be inferred from longitudinal sera.
